question: Unlawful assembly in Uttar Pradeshâ€™s Rampur was restricted in light of the protests against the Citizenship Amendment Act by imposing which of the following sections of CrPC?
explanation: The section 144 of the Code of Criminal Procedure (CrPC) was imposed in the Rampur region of Uttar Pradesh. This section empowers the executive magistrate to ban unlawful assembly. An aggregation of more than 4 people in an area would amount to unlawful assembly.
